Title: Classic Open Air Nürnberg 2023 - First day - State Philharmonic Orchestra Nürnberg
Description:
Classic Open Air Nürnberg 2023 - First day

Feste feiern - Celebrate festivities
Farewell concert of Joana Mallwitz as General Music Director of the Nuremberg State Theater


Part I

                     Michail Glinka
[00:00:00] - Overture to Ruslan and Ludmilla

                     Johann Strauss, jr.
[00:05:57] - Overture to Die Fledermaus (The Bat)

Camille Saint-Saëns
The Carnival of the Animals (excerpts)

[00:14:06] - 01. Movement: Introduction and Royal March of the Lion
[00:16:22] - 07. Movement: Aquarium
[00:18:42] - 10. Movement: Aviary
[00:20:09] - 04. Movement: Tortoises
[00:22:31] - 13. Movement: The Swan
[00:25:51] - 14. Movement: Finale

                     William Walton
[00:28:08] - Crown Imperial March

Friedrich Gulda
Concerto for Cello and Wind Orchestra (excerpts)*

[00:35:32] - 01. Movement: Ouverture
[00:40:41] - 05. Movement: Finale alla marcia


Part II

                     Johannes Brahms
[00:48:15] - Academic festive overture
                     (played by The Young State Philharmonic Orchestra Nürnberg)

                     Marko Nikodijevic
[00:58:23] - GHB - Dance aggregate

                     Pietro Mascagni
[01:04:35] - Intermezzo sinfonico from Cavalleria rusticana

Ottorino Respighi
Feste Romane

[01:08:38] - 01. Movement: Circenses - Circus Games or Circus Maximus
[01:13:10] - 02. Movement: Il Giubileo - The Jubilee
[01:19:50] - 03. Movement: L'Ottobrata - The October Harvest or The October Festival
[01:27:20] - 04. Movement: La Befana - The Epiphany


Encores

                     Felix Mendelssohn-Bartholdy
[01:33:38] - Wedding March from A Midsummer Night's Dream, op. 61

                     John Williams
[01:38:15] - Hedwig's Theme from Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

*Beate Altenburg, cello

State Philharmonic Orchestra Nürnberg
The Young State Philharmonic Orchestra Nürnberg
Joana Mallwitz, conductor

Recorded live on 30.07.2023
at the Luitpoldhain Nürnberg (Open Air)
